item.title: Hello!
item.description: Welcome to my website! If you would like to learn more about me, you can use the links at the top of the page to view my resume and some of my projects!
item.content: Welcome to my website! If you would like to learn more about me, you can use the links at the top of the page to view my resume and some of my projects!

item.title: Arctic Express Pack
item.description: I developed the website for Arctic Express Pack LLC, based out of Fort Worth, Texas. The original version of the site used plain HTML, CSS, and Javascript with hosting provided by GoDaddy. Since then, I have migrated the site over to Linode with NGINX acting as a reverse proxy to serve the app. The app itself uses a Nodejs backend to handle routing and templating as well as MySQL for managing data.
item.content:
I developed the website for Arctic Express Pack LLC, based out of Fort Worth, Texas. The original version of the site used plain HTML, CSS, and Javascript with hosting provided by GoDaddy.

Since then, I have migrated the site over to Linode with NGINX acting as a reverse proxy to serve the app. The app itself uses a Nodejs backend to handle routing and templating as well as MySQL for managing data.

You can visit the website here!

item.title: Node Chat
item.description: An anonymous online chat application using a Nodejs backend and the SocketIO library for handling client-server communication. Check it out here! View the source here!
item.content:
An anonymous online chat application using a Nodejs backend and the SocketIO library for handling client-server communication.

Check it out here!
View the source here!

item.title: Resume
item.description: Professional Summary A self-taught software developer with a passion for learning and experimenting with the latest computer technologies. I design and develop software solutions with a strong emphasis on object-oriented design principles which leads to modular, testable, and reusable code. Relevant Skills Web Technologies Languages Databases HTML, CSS, Sass C, C++, Go MySQL, SQLite React, Vue PostgreSQL Bash, Python Nodejs, Hugo Redis Typescript Relevant Experience Freelance Web Developer
item.content:
Professional Summary

A self-taught software developer with a passion for learning and experimenting with the latest computer technologies. I design and develop software solutions with a strong emphasis on object-oriented design principles which leads to modular, testable, and reusable code.

Relevant Skills

Web Technologies Languages Databases
HTML, CSS, Sass C, C++, Go MySQL, SQLite
React, Vue PostgreSQL Bash, Python
Nodejs, Hugo Redis Typescript

Relevant Experience

Freelance Web Developer

  • Worked with clients to understand their needs regarding a new website

  • Maintained active and regular communication with clients throughout development

  • Delivered consistent updates that incorporated client feedback and suggestions

Education

University of North Texas
Bachelor of Science: Applied Arts and Sciences
